title: Cluster monitoring
pageDescription: A Kubernetes cluster can be monitored to track its status. This can help prevent a possible shortage of computing resources or track an incorrect cluster configuration.
shortDescription: How to track the state of a Kubernetes cluster
metaDescription: Cloud Containers: Kubernetes cluster monitoring, cluster status tracking, using Grafana and Prometheus
markdown: A Kubernetes cluster can be monitored to track its status. This can help prevent a possible shortage of computing resources or track an incorrect cluster configuration.
